panels.description: The heatmap shows different time intervals on the x-axis, with the duration buckets on the y-axis. Each cell in the heatmap has a color that represents the number of reconciliations that fell into the corresponding duration bucket during that time interval. Darker or brighter colors typically indicate higher frequencies of reconciliations in that duration range.

rowsFrame.value: Reconciliation rate of reconciliations in the past 5 minutes
